# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a text container from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: A coder that implements [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder].

## Creating a text container

- **init(size:)**: Initializes a text container with a specified bounding rectangle.
